content: the easy peasy slouchy fisherman beanie is a beanie that was completely inspired by a movie i saw recently not only is it a cute wear-it-any-time-any-where kind of beanie but it s super easy to make there are so many options from the color to resizing and even using different yarn weights because the construction of the easy peasy slouchy fisherman beanie is so simple you can create this hat using light medium and even bulky weight yarn i especially love the way it looks when using a lightweight yarn within the pattern you will find instructions on how to resize your beanie to fit the average toddler all the way up to an adult male you will also find color-coded quick-reference charts within the pattern these will tell you how many chains you need to begin with and how many row you will need to end with for each size and yarn weight materials needed * 1 skein lion brand touch of alpaca bonus bundle * us size h/8 5 0mm crochet hook * tapestry needle
